title: Textile, "Metropolis", 1955
medium: Technique: screen printed using 3 screens (4th for information at edge)
inscribed: on left edge: "METROPOLIS" hand print by ELENHANK DESIGNERS, INC."
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 272 x 133 cm (8 ft. 11 1/16 in. x 52 3/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of Henry C. and Eleanor Kluck
description: Green,gold and white design of massed city buildings.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Metropolis", 1955.
1955. Technique: screen printed using 3 screens (4th for information at edge). Gift of Henry C. and Eleanor Kluck. 1985-84-4.
